message-area.no-message-perm: You don't have permission to talk in this channel.

account.title: Edit Your Profile
account.more-profile-notice: This information is seen by everyone.

notification.title: Change your notification settings.
notification.notification-sound-details: Makes a cool sound to get your attention
notification.push-notification-details: Get push notifications even when the app is closed.

manage-emojis.details: Upload your own pretty emojis for free! Emojis must be 3MB or less.
manage-emojis.supported-types: Supported types are: png, jpg, gif

startup-options.title: Desktop App Startup Options
startup-options.notice: To modify these settings, you must download the Nertivia desktop app.

program-activity.details: Share programs or games you are running by adding apps below. This will replace your custom status when a program is opened and revert back when the program is closed.
program-activity.notice: To use the program acitivty feature, you must download the Nertivia desktop app.

manage-bots.details: Create bot users which will allow you to use our API to create your own fancy bots.
manage-bots.command-notice: Add bot commands to easily let users know which commands exist for your bot

delete-account.notice: You are about to delete your account
delete-account.messages-sent: Your messages sent to public servers

language.details: Contribute by submitting a PR in the GitHub repo.

add-friend-popout.notice: Add a friend by typing their username and tag.

add-server-popout.title: Add Server
add-server-popout.join-server-notice: Join a server by entering in an invite code.
add-server-popout.create-server-notice: Create your own server. Start by naming your server.
